languages.text: "Разумеется. Но я... с интересом понаблюдаю за тобой, мо{mf|й|я} звер{mf|ек|ушка}". {n}Глаза Маражая пылают темным огнем, когда он легонько подталкивает вас в спину.{/n}
"Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Но я... с интересом понаблюдаю за тобой, мо{mf|й|я} звер{mf|ек|ушка}". {n}Глаза Маражая пылают темным огнем, когда он легонько подталкивает вас в спину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}
"Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}
"Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}
"Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

languages.text: “当然了，不过我……会饶有兴趣地观察你的，我的宠物。”{n}玛拉斋双眼中闪烁着阴暗的火焰，轻轻在你背上推了一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当然了，不过我……会饶有兴趣地观察你的，我的宠物。”{n}玛拉斋双眼中闪烁着阴暗的火焰，轻轻在你背上推了一下。{/n}

languages.text: 「もちろん。俺は…お前をじっくり見守ってるぜ、俺のペット」{n}マラズハイの瞳は暗い炎で燃え、あなたの背中を軽く押した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん。俺は…お前をじっくり見守ってるぜ、俺のペット」{n}マラズハイの瞳は暗い炎で燃え、あなたの背中を軽く押した。{/n}

languages.text: «Desde luego. Pero yo... te estaré observando con interés, mascotita mía». {n}Un fuego siniestro arde en los ojos de Marazhai al darte un suave codazo en la espalda.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego. Pero yo... te estaré observando con interés, mascotita mía». {n}Un fuego siniestro arde en los ojos de Marazhai al darte un suave codazo en la espalda.{/n}

languages.text: « Libre à vous. Quant à moi... je n'en perdrai pas une miette, {mf|mon cher petit|ma chère petite} esclave. » {n}Les yeux de Marazhai brûlent d'un feu obscur alors qu'il vous administre une petite tape dans le dos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Libre à vous. Quant à moi... je n'en perdrai pas une miette, {mf|mon cher petit|ma chère petite} esclave. » {n}Les yeux de Marazhai brûlent d'un feu obscur alors qu'il vous administre une petite tape dans le dos.{/n}

languages.text: "Natürlich. Aber ich ... werde Euch dabei mit Interesse beobachten, {mf|mein Ergebener|meine Ergebene}." {n}Marazhais Augen lodern vor dunklem Feuer, während er dir einen leichten Klaps auf den Rücken gibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Aber ich ... werde Euch dabei mit Interesse beobachten, {mf|mein Ergebener|meine Ergebene}." {n}Marazhais Augen lodern vor dunklem Feuer, während er dir einen leichten Klaps auf den Rücken gibt.{/n}

languages.text: "Tabii ki. Ancak seni... İlgiyle izleyeceğim evcil hayvanım." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, seni sırtından nazikçe iterken karanlık bir alevle parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course. But I... will be watching you with interest, my pet." {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire as he gives you a gentle nudge in the back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki. Ancak seni... İlgiyle izleyeceğim evcil hayvanım." {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, sırtından nazik bir şekilde iterken karanlık bir alevle parıldıyor.{/n}
